metadata.title: CVE-2015-4625 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
Integer overflow in the authentication_agent_new_cookie function inPolicyKit (aka polkit) before 0.113 allows local users to gain privilegesby creating a large number of connections, which triggers the issuance of aduplicate cookie value.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-4625` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-polkit-1.0 - 0.105-4ubuntu3.14.04.2
libpolkit-agent-1-0 - 0.105-4ubuntu3.14.04.2
libpolkit-backend-1-0 - 0.105-4ubuntu3.14.04.2
libpolkit-gobject-1-0 - 0.105-4ubuntu3.14.04.2
policykit-1 - 0.105-4ubuntu3.14.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: policykit-1 package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.105-4ubuntu3.14.04.2').
